attributes.action: stop rejecting petitions which dispute climate change or suggest tackling the real causes of co2 emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Almost every petition (look at the list of rejections) which disputes the climate change hysteria is rejected. Yet any (and there are a lot of duplicates) which promote this hype are published
80% minimum of co2 is not produced by motor vehicles and aeroplanes, but -all- the "effort" is only addressed at cars and aviation.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
